spells.name: Ablative Barrier
spells.description: Surrounds the target with layers of force.

spells.name: Animal Aspect
spells.description: You gain some of the beneficial qualities of an animal.

spells.name: Bestow Weapon Proficiency
spells.description: Grants a creature proficiency in a single weapon for short period of time.

spells.name: Brow Gasher
spells.description: Slashing weapon deals bleed damage to an opponent's head.

spells.name: Effortless Armor
spells.description: Armor you wear no longer slows your speed.

spells.name: Mount, Communal
spells.description: As mount, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Pilfering Hand
spells.description: You may seize an object or manipulate it from afar.

spells.name: Reloading Hands
spells.description: Loads a single shot into your weapon every round.

spells.name: Reinforce Armaments, Communal
spells.description: As reinforce armaments, but you may divide the duration among objects touched.

spells.name: Returning Weapon, Communal
spells.description: As returning weapon, but you may divide the duration among weapons touched.

spells.name: Tactical Acumen
spells.description: You gain an additional +1 on attack rolls or to AC due to battlefield positioning.

spells.name: Telekinetic Assembly
spells.description: Assembles a siege engine using 1 fewer worker for every two caster levels.

spells.name: Twisted Space
spells.description: Targeted creature's attacks target a random square instead of the intended target.
